mapper.select: select NOTICE_NO noticeNo, NOTICE_SUB noticeSub, NOTICE_CON noticeCon, NOTICE_DATE noticeDate, NOTICE_KIND noticeKind, NOTICE_FILE noticeFile, NOTICE_HITS noticeHits, EMPLOYEE_ID employeeId from notice

select NOTICE_NO noticeNo, NOTICE_SUB noticeSub, NOTICE_CON noticeCon, NOTICE_DATE noticeDate, NOTICE_KIND noticeKind, NOTICE_FILE noticeFile, NOTICE_HITS noticeHits, EMPLOYEE_ID employeeId from notice where NOTICE_NO = #{noticeNo}
mapper.insert: insert into notice (NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_SUB, NOTICE_CON, NOTICE_DATE, NOTICE_KIND, NOTICE_FILE, NOTICE_HITS, EMPLOYEE_ID) values ((),#{noticeSub},#{noticeCon},sysdate, #{noticeKind}, #{noticeFile} null ,0,#{employeeId})
